price: Anaasε, wͻn a wͻdi dwuma bͻne no adwen yε wͻn sε wͻbɛtumi adwane Yεn anaa? Atemmuo bͻne paa na wͻrebuo no.
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-sayiāti an yasbiqūnā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
